title: Designing for Accessibility
excerpt: Key principles, quick wins, and the workflow we use to make our product inclusive by default.
author: Acme Design
content:
# Accessibility Matters

We treat accessibility as a core quality attribute.

## Principles
1. Perceivable
2. Operable
3. Understandable
4. Robust

## Checklist
- Sufficient color contrast
- Keyboard navigation
- Semantic HTML
- ARIA where appropriate
